sentence: In early trading on Monday, shares of Apple topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.6%.
Year to date, Apple registers a 30.5% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Home Depot, trading down 0.1%.
Home Depot is showing a gain of 26.5% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Caterpillar, trading up 0.2%, and Goldman Sachs Group, trading up 1.2% on the day.
